description: doc: discuss go command in go1.html

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

http://codereview.appspot.com/5609047/diff/4001/doc/go1.html File doc/go1.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5609047/diff/4001/doc/go1.html#newcode1607 doc/go1.html:1607:

Code organization and GOPATH

this doesn't seem like the place to put a manual, or to put it another way, this is too much information for this document. there should be a paragraph or two here and a callout to a fuller document.

On 1 February 2012 17:12, wrote: > > http://codereview.appspot.com/5609047/diff/4001/doc/go1.html > File doc/go1.html (right): > > http://codereview.appspot.com/5609047/diff/4001/doc/go1.html#newcode1607 > doc/go1.html:1607:

Code organization and GOPATH

> this doesn't seem like the place to put a manual, or to put it another > way, this is too much information for this document. there should be a > paragraph or two here and a callout to a fuller document. Alright, I'll beef up /doc/code.html with much of this stuff and refer to that. Andrew

subject: code review 5609047: doc: discuss go command in go1.html
